column4: OK. I did the dpkg-reconfigure and I told it to use the SiS driver. Starting X gives me "XIO: fatal IO errors 104 (Connection reset by peer) on X server ":0.0" after 0 requests (0 known processed) with 0 events remaining."
put the contents of /var/log/Xfree86.0.log in pastebin.com
there should be an X log file in that directory
